name: Mammoth Expedition
description:
The game is fairly simple. answer yes or no questions, and try to stay alive while the digging team reach the frozen Mammoth.. you can win if you make good decisions.

every time you play you might have new encounters… 

see if you encounter these: Potato Farm, Energy System, 

good luck …

please let us know if you’ve won

don't forget to rate and give your criticism 

Ludum Dare Page: 

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/mammoth-expedition
